LanguageData.Ancot.StaminaConsumeRateRangeDesc:
The factor of stamina cost when blocking a ranged attack with this shield, influenced by the shield's protective ability against ranged damage and its sharp armor. 
The calculation formula for stamina cost is as follows:

stamina cost = attack damage amount x attack armor penetration (%) x stamina consume factor (range)

If the stamina cost exceeds the stamina cost threshold, it will be calculated as threshold cost.
LanguageData.Ancot.StaminaConsumeRateMeleeDesc:
The factor of stamina cost when blocking a melee attack with this shield, influenced by the shield's protective ability against melee damage and its sharp armor. 
The calculation formula for stamina cost is as follows:

stamina cost = attack damage amount x attack armor penetration (%) x stamina consume factor (melee)

If the stamina cost exceeds the stamina cost threshold, it will be calculated as threshold cost.
